_sText:
Well this is my first upload here however ... it isnt my first map ^^

awp_lego_blockfort

You might know the name from somewhere? Well its a map which is similar (in layout) to mariokart.

The only reason I made this map was I was fed up with different awp_lego maps that were too small and therefore not much fun >.<

Basically, this is just a map which has lighting, a few ramps at differnt heights.
You cant get spawn killed (unless you run into the gap in the middle :P)

84 players in total can play on this map (42 per team) and every player begins with:

- awp
- deagle
- knife
- grenade

Considering this is NOT my first map, I would appreciate feedback and be harsh with me ... its the only way that I will improve!

The download should contain the BSP and the correct map textures (would use pacrat or something else) however, my computer loves to reject it which is pretty annoying :(

If for some strange reason, the textures arent included, here is the link:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/1348

This map was made within a few minutes as it wasnt very difficult to construct.
* Please do not upload elsewhere and do not edit the map *

Please enjoy :D

CookieHorde

P.S As mentioned, credits to the people that made the lego textures.
